description:
CDTA is a public transportation authority in the Capital Region.  This dataset presents information that external stakeholders find valuable for understanding the governance, financial, and strategic positions of the organization.  
The dataset being reported contains organization number of employees, number of vehicles, and operating budget.

name: Capital District Transportation Authority (CDTA) Annual Reports: Beginning 2007
